1.0.2: Add an increase max hp spell
1.0.3: Add archive button, you now can archive your habits aka soft delete without losing its statistics.
Change on UI, made it much simplier and now you can long press on the habits to open its actions.
1.0.4: Allow past habits to be toggled without getting any xp of coins
Toast feedback on change in xp or coins
Enhance day navigator, tap on the date to go to a specific date
